A

ApiRegionBGM - Class in com.yuti.regionbgm.server.api
This class is used by the other server-side mods to triggers actions on clients having RegionBGM installed Basically, it will allows to play musical resources (youtube, twitch, anything...) and stop the music.
askForRefresh() - Method in class com.yuti.regionbgm.client.music.BackgroundMusicManager
Send a PacketAskRefresh packet to the server to ask a refresh of the BGM.

B

BackgroundMusicManager - Class in com.yuti.regionbgm.client.music
This manager allows the manage the music on client-side.

This thread is used to play the BGM of the mod.

BackgroundMusicTrackManager - Class in com.yuti.regionbgm.client.music
Manage the tracks which needs to be played as a BGM.

PacketStopMusic - Class in com.yuti.regionbgm.network
